Installation

Install Prerequisites

>Install Cmake Prerequisites for Linux

#Cmake 3.2 or greater is needed
sudo apt-get install cmake # Cmake install - Additional help here
sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade

>Install Boost Prerequisites for Linux (sudo)

#Boost 1.56 or greater is required
wget -O 1_60.tar.bz2 https://sourceforge.net/projects/boost/files/boost/1.60.0/boost_1_60_0.tar.bz2/download
tar --bzip2 -xf 1_60.tar.bz2
cd boost_1_60_0
./bootstrap.sh
sudo ./b2 install #It is going to be a bit. :)

>Install Boost Prerequisites for Linux (non sudo)

#Boost 1.56 or greater is required
wget -O 1_60.tar.bz2 https://sourceforge.net/projects/boost/files/boost/1.60.0/boost_1_60_0.tar.bz2/download
tar --bzip2 -xf 1_60.tar.bz2
cd boost_1_60_0
./bootstrap.sh 
./b2 #It is worth the wait. ;)
BOOST_INCLUDE=$(pwd)
BOOST_INCLUDE_LIB=$(pwd)/stage/lib
#Need to modify the cmake command in install
#cmake -DCMAKE_INLCUDE_PATH=$BOOST_INCLUDE -DCMAKE_LIBRARY_PATH=$BOOST_INCLUDE_LIB ..

For additionally help with the boost install please refer to the Boost website

Install Prerequisites for Mac

#Homebrew is required for the following instructions - Here is a tutorial to install homebrew
brew upgrade
brew install cmake
brew install boost

Installation HTStream

The basic install

git clone https://github.com/ibest/HTStream.git
cd HTStream
mkdir build && cd build
cmake ..
#with non sudo access please run this command
#cmake -DCMAKE_INCLUDE_PATH=$BOOST_INCLUDE -DCMAKE_LIBRARY_PATH=$BOOST_INCLUDE_LIB -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=[PATH FOR EXECUTABLES TO BE WRITTEN TO] .. 
#PATH:=$PATH:[PATH FOR EXECUTABLES TO BE WRITTEN TO]/bin
make #install to /usr/local/bin with sudo access (or location specified with not sudo access)

All applications have unit test that can be run

Trouble Shooting

Some users have experiences issues with the boost install. We think this arises from previous versions of boost being installed.

#One solution was
    camke -DBoost_NO_SYSTEM_PATHS=TRUE -DBOOST_INCLUDEDIR=/usr/local/include/ ..
    #This works if boost was installed to /usr/local/include
